# VEHICLE::SET_CHECK_FOR_ENOUGH_ROOM_FOR_PED

## Summary
Set whether we should perform a shape test when choosing the entry point in a vehicle to ensure there's enough room for the ped

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** shouldCheckForEnoughRoomToFitPed

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Only used in R* Script fm_content_cargo
